remarks: Domain of a relation shifted by ` A ` .  The set on the right is more commonly notated as ` ( dom F + A ) ` (meaning add ` A ` to every element of ` dom F ` ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
statement:
shftfval.1 $e |- F e. _V $.
shftdm $p |- ( A e. CC -> dom ( F shift A ) = { x e. CC | ( x - A ) e. dom F } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
